summary.span: 表示将对 控件的以下事件进行处理的方法：、、 或 。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , or event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ， ，或的事件控制可以处理用于确定由调用的方法的参数控件。The , , , or event of the control allows you to manipulate the parameters that are used to determine the method that is called by the control. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用示例中间层业务对象。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初，显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮，并属性将确定哪种方法执行操作。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button, and the property will identify which method performs the action. 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数以插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因，集合的字符串控件传递自动是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托处理对象事件并使你能够操作前的输入的参数操作继续进行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法要求`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个使用字符串的集合创建，添加到集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含以下两个基本类和一个其他类：The code example consists of the following two basic classes and one additional class: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是一个无状态类封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. - 附加`NorthwindDataException`类，该类为了提供便利。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class, which is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类适用于在 Northwind Trader 数据库，这是随 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 示例数据库。This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database that is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 有关完整的工作示例，使用这些类，通过将它们放在 App_Code 目录下的应用程序根目录中或将其编译成库，然后将生成的 DLL 放在 Bin 目录中。For a complete working example, use these classes by placing them in the App_Code directory under the application root or by compiling them into a library and placing the resulting DLL in the Bin directory. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你会将数据插入 Northwind Trader 数据库时使用此示例试验。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]
